about_the_game:
It's time to stop Fumbling...

And time to start Freaking...

Fumble Freaks is a 5v5 football game that blends over-the-top ragdoll chaos with classic gridiron strategy. Whether you're diving for a wobbly pass, tumbling into the end zone, or watching your perfectly planned play dissolve into mayhem, every match is a highlight reel waiting to happen.

🏈 FEATURES 🏈

Hilariously Chaotic Football – Experience a fresh take on the sport with exaggerated physics, simplified mechanics, and non-stop action.

Singleplayer & Multiplayer Exhibition – Compete with or against your friends in head-to-head matchups.

Build Your Own Playbook – Customize your strategy before each game and create the perfect lineup of ridiculous (but effective?) plays.

Season Mode & Progression – Compete for trophies, unlock new plays, and climb the ranks as you lead your team to glory.

Cosmetic Customization – Deck out your squad with freaky accessories, and more.

Get ready for the most ridiculous, physics-driven football experience ever!
